main event: On May 7, 1957, an unidentified flying object was observed at Edwards Air Force Base, California.
interesting points: The object was described as round and silver, approximately 40 feet in diameter., It was observed to move at a high rate of speed before disappearing., The sighting lasted for around 1 minute and was not visible to the naked eye but appeared on radar., Several military personnel reported seeing a bright illuminated object., The object was silent and exhibited erratic movement before it vanished.
witness description: Captain and Master Sergeant from the 6511th Test Squadron, Edwards AFB.
